biotools.summary: scDART (single cell Deep learning model for ATAC-Seq and RNA-Seq Trajectory integration) is a scalable deep learning framework that embed the two data modalities of single cells, scRNA-seq and scATAC-seq data, into a shared low-dimensional latent space while preserving cell trajectory structures. Furthermore, scDART learns a nonlinear function represented by a neural network encoding the cross-modality relationship simultaneously when learning the latent space representations of the integrated dataset.
